author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORM AS THE CENTER PASSES ABOUT 175 MILES SOUTH OF KAUAI...
summary:
...HONE WEAKENS TO A TROPICAL STORM AS THE CENTER PASSES ABOUT 175 MILES SOUTH OF KAUAI...
 As of 11:00 PM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 19.3, -159.7
 with movement W at 14 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 996 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
